name: Sheeps Ahoy
description:
HI

this game was made for the GAMERella 2019 game jam!! keep as many of ur sheep alive for as long as possible!! every second that passes u will get  apoint for every sheep not taken!

art: jerika melgar (itch | art station | instagram)

sound: nic plum (itch | twitter)

coding: noé charron (itch | twitter | twitch)

CONTROLS
  • move left/right: left/right arrow OR a/d OR left stick on gamepads
  • jump: spacebar OR up arrow OR bottom face button on gamepads
  • aim: move mouse around OR right stick on gamepads
  • suck/shoot: mouse click OR any trigger/bumper on gamepads
  • restart: r OR right menu button on gamepads
BUGS
  • no controller rumble or screen shake yet :/
